name: Dishonor thy Neighbor
description:
When you get an anonymous tip that the cops are about to show up at your doorstep in five minutes, you return the favor by calling the cops on your neighbors. Both of you (Yes, both of you) are suspects of a ridiculous crime, and you've each got evidence - leverage - against one another to prove it. Dishonor thy Neighbor is a shared-screen, first-person game of both attrition and aggression, in which furnaces meet evidence with open arms and pans and pillows are weapons of “self-defense”. The neighbor with the most evidence (and a beating heart) by the end of five minutes wins!

Follow the game's development on...

Twitter
Discord
